text: I'm looking at the Vast template for Abandoned Cart Emails, which contains a cart summary. This in turn contains the following module: `{% email_each list="deal.line_items" item="line_item" %}`. Can't find any documentation on this module. Can somebody provide more information? I understand it's looping through the line items from an associated deal but how does it determine which deal? Can it be used in other ways? Tell me more! :simple_smile:
There is no official documentation i found on it <@UCGBUH5TM> but when we implemented the same, it shows the latest assigned deal to the customer, this works best with `ecomm bridge` integration.
In terms of “which” deal, it will work when you use it an Deal based workflow, that way you always know which Deal it is, it will be the one that got enrolled in the Workflow

Great, thank you <@UFBNA9K9A>. Could it be used in a similar way with other workflows and object, e.g. a company workflow with an email that lists all associated contacts at the company? Like: `{% email_each list="company.associated_contacts" item="contact" %}` then referencing `{{ contact.first_name }}` etc?
No, it really only works with deals, I’ve tried testing other objects but I can’t get them to work
